replies.author: hoshizorayuki
replies.txt_content:
尝试调整CoreProtect配置中worldedit键值
config.yml:

# Logs changes made via the plugin "WorldEdit" if it's in use on your server.
worldedit: false
复制代码

replies.author: MionDeathRay丶
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 MionDeathRay丶 于 2019-2-28 02:03 编辑 

卸载Core后可以正常使用WE但是会出现玩家上线背包丢失的情况 很痛苦
